VideoGame.name: Tekken7
VideoGame.reason: Tekken 7 is my favorite game because it is a 3d fighter that allows for more movement and footsies than traditional 2d fighters. My main is Kuma

Anime.name: CowboyBebop
Anime.reason: My favorite anime is Cowboy Bebop, because i love the story, art style, and music.

TVShow.name: BreakingBad
TVShow.reason: Breaking Bad is my favorite TV show because it has no clear hero, and makes you really think about why certain characters take the actions they do.
